Articles.Content:
So i just launched a massive ship (8mil tons wet mass) using experimental b9. I used up most of its fuel and cannot, for the life of me figure out how i can possibly refuel it for 570,000 units of fuel. Are there any (cheaty) ways to increase the amount of fuel in a tank?

Edited August 30, 2014 by Snakesballz
Launch a new craft with that amount of fuel using infinite fuel enabled in the debug menu, make sure you have a way of docking them together.

You can edit the persistence file to refill the tanks. Look for the RESOURCE{} sections for the fuel types and make the amount value the same as maxAmount.

I believe there's also a mod that lets you send refueling missions automagically. IIRC, it runs a time delay, but doesn't actually create the vessel or fly it.

Also, Hyperedit with a new version of the same craft.
Hyperedit actually lets you directly edit the resources on the focused ship, no need to send another.

I would actually love to see pictures of an 8mil ton craft. I can't even imagine how big that thing is.

Welcome to the forums.

~Claw
